properties.description:
We will always run as incremental. In the first run, it will load the whole table and write the last record loaded in watermark table. The next time you load will be really incremental.

Note: In case of history load, we need to replace the path from raw to hst. Parameter var_table must contain key "is_history" that should be set to 'True' or 'true'. If it's not history, the parameter isn't needed

- For incremental load use:
tables =
["{'schema':'INTEGRADORWEB', 'table':'TB_CONGELADO_EPASS', 'is_history':'True', 'load_type':'incremental', 'partition_column':'DS_ANO_MES', 'partitions':4, 'control_column':'DS_ANO_MES', 'control_column_type_2_db':'datetime', 'control_column_default_value':'20161201000000', 'control_column_mask_value':'MMYYYY','columns':'DS_ANO_MES,CD_ATENDIMENTO,DR,CD_UNIDADE_ATENDIMENTO_DR,NM_UNIDADE_ATENDIMENTO,CD_ENTIDADE_REGIONAL,CD_ATENDIMENTO_DR,DS_ATENDIMENTO,CD_PESSOA_UNIDD_ATENDTO,CD_PESSOA_JURIDICA,NR_CNPJ,NM_RAZAO_SOCIAL,DT_INICIO,DT_TERMINO_PREVISTO,DT_TERMINO,ACM_HORAS_ANO,ACM_HORAS_CONTRATO,DT_ATUALIZACAO',
'raw': {'partition_by': [{'col_name': 'YEAR', 'implementation': 'df.withColumn(\\'YEAR\\', functions.substring(functions.col(\\'DS_ANO_MES\\'), 3, 6)).withColumn(\\'YEAR\\', functions.col(\\'YEAR\\').cast(\\'int\\'))'},{'col_name': 'MONTH', 'implementation': 'df.withColumn(\\'MONTH\\', functions.substring(functions.col(\\'DS_ANO_MES\\'), 1, 2)).withColumn(\\'MONTH\\', functions.col(\\'MONTH\\').cast(\\'int\\'))'}]}}"]

activities.name: raw_load_bdo_unified__0__switch_env
